mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'), " ~ ", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')) AS date
SELECT EVENT.event_id, EVENT.event_code FROM EVENT, EVENT_MANAGER WHERE EVENT.event_id=EVENT_MANAGER.event_id AND EVENT_MANAGER.manager_id=#{managerId}

SELECT n.server_id, s.server_nm, n.ip, e.event_code, m.manager_nm, n.msg, n.ntfc_mth, n.ntfcde, n.logde FROM SERVER s, MANAGER m, NOTIFICATION_HISTORY n, EVENT e WHERE n.server_id=s.server_id AND n.event_id=e.event_id AND n.manager_id=m.manager_id AND m.team_id=#{teamId}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AS date, count(*) AS count FROM NOTIFICATION_HISTORY WHERE server_id=#{serverId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(rgsde,'%Y-%m-%d') LIMIT 7
SELECT event_code, count(*) AS count FROM NOTIFICATION_HISTORY WHERE rgsde > (CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND server_id=#{serverId} GROUP BY event_code ORDER BY count LIMIT 5
